dashboard.title: Survey Forms

surveyList.noSurveys: No surveys available for your role

formDescriptions.form1: Help us understand how you learn best and what supports your learning
formDescriptions.form2: Provide detailed insights about individual student growth and support needs
formDescriptions.form3: Share your professional insights on equity, access, and inclusion at your learning center
formDescriptions.form4: Document existing courses and explore interest in digital delivery
